#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

const int MAXN = 1e6 + 9;

int pi[2 * MAXN + 9];
string s;
int k;

inline bool go(string cur,int patlen){
	memset(pi,0,sizeof(pi));
	int len = (int)cur.length();

	pi[0] = 0;
	for(int i = 1;i < len;++i){
		int j = pi[i - 1];

		while(true){
			if(cur[j] == cur[i]){
				pi[i] = j + 1;
				break;
			}

			if(j == 0){
				pi[i] = 0;
				break;
			}

			j = pi[j - 1];
		}
	}

	int cnt = 0;
	for(int i = patlen;i < len;++i){
		if(pi[i] == patlen) ++cnt;
	}

	return (cnt >= k);
}

int main (){
	int len;

	scanf("%d",&len);
	cin >> s;
	scanf("%d",&k);

	int lo = 0,hi = len;
	int ans = 0;

	while(lo <= hi){
	    int md = (lo + hi) >> 1;
	    string cur = s.substr(0,md) + "$" + s;
	
	    if(go(cur,md)){
	    	ans = md;
	    	lo = md + 1;
	    } else {
	    	hi = md - 1;
	    }
	}

	printf("%d\n%s\n",ans,s.substr(0,ans).c_str());
	return 0;
}
